magic-square_key3: Magic Square woh square hota hai jismei - har row ka, har column ka, and dono diagonals ka sum same hota hai.
magic-square_key4: Aapko yeh program likhna hai - jo ek nested list leta hai, aur dekhta hai ki woh magic square hai ya nahi?
magic-square_key5: E.g. Yeh magic square hai, kyuki
magic-square_key6: Yeh magic square nahi hai, kyuki:
magic-square_key7: Kyuki second row ka sum 15 nahi hai, isliye yeh magic square nahi hai.
magic-square_key9: Kya aapka likha program sirf 3x3 square ke liye chalta hai, ya kisi bhi size ke square ke liye chal jaata hai?
magic-square_key10: Isse kisi bhi square size ke liye likhe, jisse ki user koi bhi square size likhei toh aapka program sahi `output` de.
magic-square_key12: Iss `nested list` ke liye aapka kya answer hoga - `True` ya `False`. Aapka answer kya hona chahiye.
magic-square_key13:
**Hint**
Agar di hui `nested list` ek `square` nahi hai, toh aapko pehle hi `False` return karna chahiye.
